trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateSelected"></xref> events of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 提供有关数据<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged"></xref>或<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateSelected"></xref>的事件<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged> event occurs when the currently selected date or range of dates changes; for example, when the user explicitly changes a selection within the current month or when the selection is implicitly changed in response to next/previous month navigation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged>事件发生时的当前选定的日期或范围日期更改; 例如，当用户显式更改当前月内或在所选内容隐式更改以响应的下一步/上个月导航时，所选内容。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateSelected> event occurs when the user explicitly changes a selection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateSelected>用户显式更改所选内容时发生事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateSelected>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateRangeEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor specifies the start and end for the new date range that has been selected.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateRangeEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>构造函数指定的开始和结束已选择新的日期范围。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateRangeEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If a single date is selected, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateRangeEventArgs.Start%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateRangeEventArgs.End%2A> property values will be equal.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 选择单个日期后，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateRangeEventArgs.Start%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateRangeEventArgs.End%2A>属性值将为相等。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateRangeEventArgs.End%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateRangeEventArgs.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DateRangeEventArgs"></xref> class.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateRangeEventArgs.Start%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateRangeEventArgs.End%2A> property values are set by the `start` and `end` parameter values of this constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateRangeEventArgs.Start%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateRangeEventArgs.End%2A>属性值由设置`start`和`end`此构造函数的参数值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateRangeEventArgs.End%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateRangeEventArgs.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: The first date/time value in the range that the user has selected.
trans-unit.target: 用户选定的范围中的第一个日期/时间值。

trans-unit.source: The last date/time value in the range that the user has selected.
trans-unit.target: 用户选定的范围中的最后一个日期/时间值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the last date/time value in the range that the user has selected.
trans-unit.target: 获取用户选定的范围内的最后一个日期/时间值。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> that represents the last date in the date range that the user has selected.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.DateTime>表示用户选定的日期范围内的最后日期。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Gets the first date/time value in the range that the user has selected.
trans-unit.target: 获取用户选定的范围内第一个日期/时间值。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> that represents the first date in the date range that the user has selected.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.DateTime>表示用户选定的日期范围的第一个日期。</xref:System.DateTime>
